channel.title: Andy Cameron on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Mechanical slaves and the Californian ideology
item.description: Noted elsewhere, saved here for reference, from Richard Barbrook and Andy Cameron, THE CALIFORNIAN IDEOLOGY If human slaves are ultimately unreliable, then mechanical ones will have to be invented. The search for the holy grail of Artificial Intelligence reveals this desire for the Golem a strong and loyal slave whose skin is the colour of the earth and whose innards are made of sand. As in Asimovâ€™s Robot novels, the techno-utopians imagine that it is possible to obtain slave like labour from inanimate machines.
